htp.subtitle: Press and Hold on the white ball and then pull in the opposite direction of where you would like to aim and release
htp.1: 1. If you pot a ball of your player's colour, you get +10 score and an extra turn
htp.2: 2. If you pot a ball of the opposite player's colour, you get -10 score and opposite player gets + 10 score and your turn is skipped
htp.3: 3. If you pot the white or black ball, game ends and the opposite player wins
htp.4: 4. Failure to pot any ball skips your turn to the next player
htp.5: 5. First to get to get to 50 score wins
